name: Ambulatory Care 2024 CNE Conference
content: This course offers LIVE (in person) and LIVESTREAM attendance options. Central time zone. This conference is designed for RNs, LPNs, MA's and Social Workers working in ambulatory care settings including primary care and subspecialties. Topics will include immunizations, behavioral health, artificial intelligence, new unlicensed roles, wellbeing, and more. Patient populations will include pediatrics through adult. This CNE conference is designed for RNs, LPNs, social workers and healthcare professionals in all ambulatory and primary care healthcare settings. Upon completion of this activity, participants should be able to: - Outline advances in technology being incorporated into ambulatory nursing practice. - Describe ambulatory initiatives related to workplace violence, dedicated education units, and unlicensed roles. - List strategies to improve nurse wellbeing. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2331254-0?pid=4868 Venue details: The Kahler Grand Hotel, 20 2nd Avenue Southwest, Heritage Hall, Rochester, Minnesota, 55902, United States Price: General Admission: USD 300.00 Time: 07:00 to 18:00
